content: <Q>...bleh. I think I’m done for now. I feel really dizzy after that one.<Q>
<Q>That’s ok! Go rest your vocal chords.<Q>
<Q>eheheh... Well, looks like you’re the only one left, Yuri!<Q>
<Q>Hey, I know you can do it, Yuri. I bet you have one of the nicest singing voices ever!<Q>
<Q>...first having to read my poems aloud to the club... now singing too?<Q>
<Q>This club continues to ask so much out of me.<Q>
